TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Now you are in a coma.

I wish for an unadulterated, non-sentient, harmless, Apple Pie ÃƒÂ¡la MÃƒÂ²de.

Granted. You're too busy with your life sentence from plutonium trafficking to eat it though.\

I wish for some of Dman's plutonium. He's got the good stuff

Granted, you're given the plutonium: An unadulterated, non-sentient, harmless, Apple Pie ÃƒÂ¡la MÃƒÂ²de... specialty of cosmic ice cream

I wish life was less confusing

Granted, life is less confusing, but you are more confusing, and that causes someone to be offended by nothing. (sorry, I couldn't resist XD)

I wish the internet wasn't so emtionless (therefor causing tone issues)

Granted, but now the only thing the internet can convey IS emotion, making understanding what someone actually means even more confusing

I wish the updated line didn't look like the sigline

Granted, now the sig line looks like the updated line. (This is funny, we're like venting our problems on this thread XD )

I wish for a new friend on this forums.

granted thy abonden you

i wish for a back door to this forum (i dont really clm down)

Granted, but the back door is tiny.

I wish for a non-sentient, non-poisonous, and non-dangerous cake.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹THE CAKE IS A LIE!

granted you eat it and it is delicious but you never get another so you are constantly craving the black forest cake

i wish for 00 status

Granted, but I don't know what it is, so your account is deleted.

I wish for more cake.

granted but its alot crappier than before

i wish for double O status

Granted, but you're Kirrim Kerman, and you get killed by Danny.

I wish for more of the initial cake I requested.

Granted. Diabetes.

I wish for an arc furnace. I need to melt some gold.

Granted, but it's so hot that it makes the gold evaporate...

I wish for something that does not harm me or anyone else.

Granted, but you die before the device start working

I wish i can jump like a frog

Granted. It's possible, but your human physiology makes it hurt a lot.

I wish I had another Mt. Dew. Refrigerated to ideal drinking temperature, no contaminants, and no giant solar flares please.

Granted. Mt. Dew is refrigerated to a nice drinking temperature. You electricity bill skyrockets, and everyone wonders why in the world you would want to cool down a lmup of dirt and rock to drinking temperature.

I wish for a non-alcoholic Segrams Ginger Ale.

Granted, but it's too expensive for you to get it.

I wish for an invisibility cloak

Granted. It is really hard to see when your eyes are invisible, no?

I wish for a passing grade on my Chemistry final

0%. Good day.

I wish for a glass of air.

Granted, but it's from Bejing.

I wish for an old movie.

Okay. But if you're a Weird Al fan like me this might be a good thing.

I wish for Dman979 to quit attempting to instigate shootouts like the infamous early-morning shootout of May 28th.

Granted. It becomes a late-night shootout from the previous night.

I wish for a hagfish.

Granted, but the delivery guy drops it.

I wish for a wish that can't be corrupted.

Sorry, but it IS corrupted.

I wish for a wish, a marvelous wish. I wish for a wish involving a fish. And this fish shall be on a dish. And the waitress's name serving it to me shall be Trish.
